snippet: The Polifiller, as in “political filler,” is a new computer tool that lets you plug in the text of any politician’s speech and, with one click, it draws red lines through jargon.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on political jargon used by New York City and State politicians.
lead_paragraph: The Polifiller, as in “political filler,” is a new computer tool that lets you plug in the text of any politician’s speech and, with one click, it draws red lines through jargon.

headline.main: Filtering Out the Jargon of Politics
headline.print_headline: Filtering Out the Jargon of Politics
